channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-16982] WebUI "Show Query" tab prints "UNKNOWN" instead of explaining configuration option
item.description:
In the Hive WebUI / Drilldown: the Show Query tab always displays "UNKNOWN."

If the user wants to see the query plan here, they should set configuration hive.log.explain.output to true. The user should be made aware of this option:

1) in WebUI / Drilldown / Show Query and

2) in HiveConf.java, line 2232.
This configuration's description reads:
"Whether to log explain output for every query
When enabled, will log EXPLAIN EXTENDED output for the query at INFO log4j log level."
this should be added:
"...and in the WebUI / Show Query tab."
item.summary: WebUI "Show Query" tab prints "UNKNOWN" instead of explaining configuration option

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
Changed WebUI / Drilldown / Query Plan so that, if hive.log.explain.output is disabled (default), the user sees:
"SET hive.log.explain.output TO true TO VIEW PLAN"

Changed hive.log.explain.output description to clarify functionality.
pvary, would you mind reviewing this please?

Hi klcopp,

Thanks for the patch. Just a quick question: Are we sure, that if the explainPlan is null, then it is because the hive.log.explain.output is false, or there can be another reason too?

Thanks,
Peter

ATTACHMENT ID: 12875250 - PreCommit-HIVE-Build
The new description of hive.log.explain.output looks good to me.

prongs
Hi, this patch clarifies to the user that configuration 

hive.log.explain.output

is now also responsible for determining whether the WebUI displays query information, because of your patch HIVE-13500 where 

if (conf.getBoolVar(ConfVars.HIVE_LOG_EXPLAIN_OUTPUT) ||
           conf.isWebUiQueryInfoCacheEnabled()) {

became

if (conf.getBoolVar(ConfVars.HIVE_LOG_EXPLAIN_OUTPUT)) {

Would you mind taking a look at this?

As discussed with klcopp offline, we can be sure that if the explainPlan is null, then it is because the hive.log.explain.output is false.

So the patch LGTM.

+1

Pushed to master.
Thanks for the patch klcopp!

Doc note: This changes the description of configuration parameter hive.log.explain.output, which is not yet documented in the wiki. It was introduced in release 1.1.0 by HIVE-8600, and ought to be documented here:

  • Configuration Properties – Query and DDL Execution
  • Getting Started – Logs
  • Language Manual – Explain

Configuration Properties can give just the new description, since the behavior isn't changing.

Added a TODOC3.0 label.

klcopp, you can take care of the documentation yourself if you get wiki edit privileges:

  • About This Wiki – How to get permission to edit
Hive 3.0.0 has been released so closing this jira.
